Her business is selling fruit in a sales stall in an interprovincial bus station, where there are a lot of people.  Some time ago she had the opportunity to increase her sales.  She met more fruit providers and managed to stock up with a variety.  In time she wants to send fruit to different regions because she received an offer.

She has had three loans up to the present, and she comments enthusiastically that one of her virtues is commitment.  She's grateful to her colleagues in the communal bank for being very optimistic people who motivate her to continue working in a group.

With the 2,000 soles [PEN] she'll buy fruit wholesale to satisfy the current demand in her stall.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fruit

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a water tank and water pipes for irrigation

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es: Elsa de 56 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo quien trabaja junto a ella en el negocio. Elsa es muy emprendedora y proactiva y siempre esta en vista de mejorar, ella posee una panadería que esta ubicada en su casa de habitación en donde realiza diferentes tipos de pan tanto dulces como salados, y que posteriormente vende de forma ambulante por diferentes colonias. Elsa solicita un préstamo con el cual pueda comprar latas nuevas para colocar la masa para el  pan y ponerlo en el horno y así incrementar la cantidad de pan que produce, lo que será de mucho beneficio para la estabilidad de su hogar.
texts.en:
Elsa is 56 years old.  She lives with her husband and they work together in their business.  Elsa is an enterprising and proactive woman who is always looking to make improvements.  She has a bakery that is located in her home.  Elsa produces different types of breads, both sweet and savory, and then sells them as a street vendor in different neighborhoods.  

She is requesting a loan so that she can buy new baking pans to hold the bread dough while it bakes in the oven.  This will allow her to increase the quantity of bread that she produces, so the loan will be a great benefit as she seeks to attain household stability.

loans.use: to buy baking pans for making bread.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: Marina de 36 años, madre de 3 hijos lleva una vida dedicada a su familia a lado de su esposo Víctor. Con el paso de los años lograron concretar una casa hecha con adobe el cual alberga a la familia en su conjunto. Dedicada por mas de 20 años a la producción de cacao admite que es un trabajo duro y requiere de toda la atención. Le agrada, el sembrado y colocación de injertos, admite ser una experta del caso. No obstante prefiere dejar el trabajo pesado para su pareja quien gustosamente accede debido a que llevan  una buena comprensión.  Las ultimas temporadas trajo consigo un buen resultado y a su vez buenas ganancias lo cual la esta motivando a adquirir mas almácigos e injertos y por consiguiente abono orgánico. Ella planea en adelante adquirir mas parcelas para trabajarlas de la misma forma e incrementar su capital de trabajo, es consiente que el éxito le sonríe cada vez más y ahora menos que nunca debe parar su ritmo de trabajo. Este es su préstamo número 06 por el cual agradece a MFP por la confianza brindada, confianza que ella piensa devolver con sus pagos puntuales, a su vez felicita a sus compañeros de su banco comunal por la responsabilidad demostrada hasta el momento. Con los 3,000 soles podrá comprar almácigos de cacao, asimismo injertos necesarios para incrementar la producción así como abono orgánico indispensables para garantizar una producción de calidad.
texts.en:
Marina is 36 years old and the mother of three children. Her life is dedicated to her family and her husband Victor. Victor and Marina built their own adobe house that their whole family lives in. For the last 20 years, Marina has worked growing cocoa beans. It is a hard job that requires much attention to detail. Marina, however, admits to being an expert at planting and grafting cocoa. Nevertheless, she prefers to leave the physically demanding tasks to her husband, who understands and gladly agrees to help out. 

The last few planting seasons had very good results and, in turn, good profits. This has motivated her to obtain more seedlings, grafts, and organic fertilizer. In the future, she plans to buy more plots of land to work in the same way and increase her working capital. Her business success makes Marina smile more. So, especially now, she knows that she should not slow the rhythm of her work.

This is Marina's sixth loan. She is very grateful that MFP trusts her to make her payments punctually. She also congratulates the other borrowers from her communal bank for the responsibility they have shown thus far. With the 3,000 soles loaned to her, Marina will be able to buy cocoa seedlings, grafts needed to increase production, and the organic fertilizer essential to guarantee quality production.

loans.use: to buy cocoa seedlings, grafts, and organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Eduardo Jesus

texts.es:
Eduardo es un hombre de 20 años, es soltero, vive  en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de su madres, Eduardo se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones su mamá cocina un riquísimo Ceviche para engreírlo, ya que es su plato favorito. 
Con mucho empeño y dedicación Eduardo trabaja como promotor de ventas en una empresa de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien porque es responsable y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Eduardo se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de prendas de vestir para su venta, tales como polos, camisas, blusas, pantalones, entre otros; de esta manera Eduardo podrá contar con la mercadería necesaria para dar inicio a su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, así pues él espera seguir trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser un buen profesional y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Eduardo is a 20-year-old single man who lives in the city of Ica, district of Santiago. He is a very friendly person, hard working and enthusiastic, who greatly desires to improve.

Thanks to his efforts and the support from his mother, Eduardo is studying for a professional career in Business Administration.  He likes to play sports in his free time. Occasionally his mother spoils him by cooking a delicious Ceviche, as it is his favorite dish.

Eduardo is a hardworking and dedicated salesperson working for a company in his city.  Everyday he starts work very early in the morning and can work approximately 8 hours.  He believes things are going well for him because he is responsible and because of his kind treatment towards others.

Eduardo is very grateful for the assistance Kiva loans provide because through these he will be able to buy clothing to resell, such as sweaters, shirts, blouses, and pants among others.  This is how Eduardo will be able to count on the merchandise needed to start a small clothing business.  

So, he expects to continue to work and try his best to achieve his dream of being a good professional and to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as sweaters, bluses, pants, shirts, etc.

loans.name: Roberta

texts.es:
Con 45 años Roberta felizmente casada con Mauricio, juntos tienen 7 hijos. todos habitan en una casa construida a base de adobe. Amante del campo, lleva 25 años cultivando café, cuya producción se encuentra en sus parcelas heredadas de sus padres, pues le han valido mucho para sacar adelante a su familia. Su mano derecha Mauricio, siempre constante con la labor, indica que de no ser un trabajo en equipo esto no hubiese funcionado. Una de las cosas que le fascina a Roberta es la cosecha de los granos, reitera  que le agrada y relaja mucho, en consecuencia  llega incluso a ser mas rápida  que los jornaleros contratados. No obstante el trabajo pesado como el traslado de sacos la termina agotando. 
Para seguir produciendo necesita adquirir semillas de café así como abono  orgánico necesarios para garantizar una producción de calidad, con el fin de seguir acumulando para luego abrir una tienda  abarrotes. Obtenido su crédito número 17, reitera su compromiso con MFP, para lo cual indica ser muy cumplida. Agradece de antemano a sus compañeros de su banco comunal por la acogida y motivación que le imparten. Con los 3,000 soles planea adquirir  semillas de café, abono orgánico necesario y la contrata de jornaleros en esta etapa de producción inicial.
texts.en:
Roberta is 45 years old and happily married to Mauricio.  Together they have seven children and they all live in a house made from adobe.  She loves the country and has spent 25 years cultivating coffee.  She plants her crops on land inherited from her parents and they have used this to help their family get ahead.  Mauricio, her right hand, is always consistent with his work and indicated that without teamwork they would not have been able to succeed.  One of the things that fascinates Roberta is that harvesting the grains pleases and relaxes her, so in consequence, she is faster than the hired day laborers.  Nevertheless, hard work like moving the sacks leaves her exhausted.

In order to continue producing, she needs to acquire coffee seeds as well as organic fertilizer to guarantee a quality crop.  She hopes to continue saving so that she can later open a grocery store.  This is her 17th loan and she remains committed to working with MFP, so she will make her payments on time.  She thanks her fellow community bank members ahead of time for their welcome and the motivation they provide.  With the 3,000 soles requested she plans to purchase coffee seeds and organic fertilizer and to hire day laborers for the first phase of production.

loans.use: to purchase coffee seeds, organic fertilizer, and hire laborers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to add more non-food goods to her inventory

loans.name: Fedaa

texts.en: Fedaa is a 42-year-old conservative married woman. She asked her husband to take the photo instead as she refused to do it herself for religious reasons. Fedaa has four sons and daughters who she wants to provide with the best life that she can, together with her husband. Her husband is a vocational worker who specializes in building blocks and bricks. Fedaa is a tailor who makes clothes and also sells them. She often gets a small quantity of clothes from the free-zone market for sale at her house. Now Fedaa has applied for this loan to buy some sewing tools and fix the sewing machine that she has.

loans.use: to buy some sewing tools and fix her sewing machine.

loans.name: Saleh

texts.en: Saleh is a 30-year-old married guy. He is supporting his four family members with the income he makes out of his business selling prom and party dresses. Saleh has applied for this youth loan to add more evening dresses to what he sells.

loans.use: to add more evening dresses to his store.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Es un hombre emprendedor con deseos de superación y con muchas posibilidades de hacer algo grande con su vida, su mayor deseo es entregarle un mejor futuro a su familia buscando tener nuevos caminos y olvidándose de la delincuencia que los rodea. Tiene un grupo familiar por el cual se esfuerza día a día, es muy trabajador y desde hace un tiempo se dedica a la elaboración de pan, quesadillas, pastelitos, pan francés entre otros, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este trabajo y se siente orgulloso porque ha logrado que le dé buenos resultados,  su panadería es muy conocida porque tiene el pan mas exquisito, ya  tiene mucha clientela en un lugar que identifico como muy bueno para desarrollar sus actividades; su meta es tener mejores beneficios que le ayuden a cumplir sus sueños. Él tiene la convicción de que si aumenta su producción así aumentarán las ventas, es por eso que se acercó solicitar un crédito que le permita comprar harina, azúcar, leche, levadura etc. Agradece la colaboración que recibirá además tiene esperanza en Dios que no lo abandonará para ya no verse influenciado por malas compañías y estar siempre ocupado en obras buenas como ésta, para así velar de la mejor manera por su familia y ser ejemplo correcto para ellos.
texts.en: This borrower is an enterprising man with a desire to get ahead and great potential to do something big with his life. His greatest wish is to give his family a better future, helping them to find new paths and forget the crime that surrounds them. He has a family, and works hard for them every day. He is a very hard worker, and he has made bread, quesadillas, cakes, french bread, and other items for some time now. He has done this work for several years and is proud because he is doing well. His bakery is very well-known because he has the most delicious bread. He has a large customer base which he says is very good for his business. His goal is to make more income which will help him to reach his dreams. He is convinced that if he increases his production, his sales will also increase. For this reason, he has requested a loan for the purchase of flour, sugar, milk, yeast, etc. He thanks you for your support, and he has faith in God that God will not abandon him; he is not influenced by bad company and he is always occupied with honest work such as his bakery. He works hard to ensure the best for his family and to be a good example for them.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, milk, and yeast.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de una joven mujer que vive junto a su grupo familiar, ella posee una panadería y ya tiene tiempo con el negocio, eso le ha regalado valiosa experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias,  comercia desde su vivienda y es muy conocida por las personas de la localidad se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefiere por que vende el pan mas exquisito elaborado con material de calidad, a buenos precios y sobre todo por el servicio excelente; es una mujer luchadora, dedicada a su labor todos los días se esfuerza por conseguir un futuro mejor con nuevos caminos y alejada de la violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en que reside, día a día se esmera al máximo pues esta feliz con su trabajo y no quiere decepcionar a su familia, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda del producto y necesita realizar una nueva inversión por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar harina, azúcar, dulce, leche, levadura etc. La joven esta entusiasmada y agradecida con el apoyo, sabe que tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda, y a la vez tiene la confianza que podrá llevar a su pequeño hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: The wish to get ahead is one of the most important dreams of this young woman who lives with her family group. She has a bread bakery and has had this business for some time. This has given her valuable experience in sales that allows her to obtain better earnings. She sells from her home and is very well known by the people in her area. She has gained many customers who prefer her because she sells the most delicious bread of the best quality at good prices and above all with excellent service. She is a fighter who strives every day to have a better future with new roads and away from the crime of which she has been a victim in the area where she lives. Day to day she works as hard as she can because she is happy with her work and does not want to dissapoint her her family. In the last few weeks demand for her products has increased and she needs to make a new investment. That is why she is asking for a loan that will allow her to buy flour, sugar, dulce de leche, milk, yeast, etc. She is enthusiastic and grateful for the support. She knows she has good payment references and is very responsible. She is sure she can pay off the debt and is confident that she can bring financial security to her small home.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, dulce de leche, milk, and yeast.

loans.name: Haidar

texts.en:
Haidar is from Iraq. He is 32 years old, married, and has two children. He is the only provider for the family.

Haidar owns a car repair shop. He specializes in repairing car bodies. He established his business in 2000 and has now an employee. He built a good experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community.

He is requesting $2,400 loan to renovate his shop and buy some equipment for his business. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family better life conditions.

loans.use: to renovate his shop and buy some equipment for his business.

loans.name: Emcograb Group

texts.es:
Don José tiene 66 años de edad, es casado, tiene cinco hijos los cuales ya son independientes y vive en el municipio del Níspero, Santa Bárbara junto a su esposa, una hija y un nieto.

El tiene 40 años de dedicarse a la agricultura con el cultivo de maíz y frijoles. Esta producción la almacenan en silos metálicos mientras la venden, sus clientes son del mercado local. Siendo esta actividad su fuente de ingresos. El sueña con sacar grandes cosechas de granos básicos, ser un agricultor grande y poderles dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
Don José ha solicitado varios prestamos a ODEF con el actual lleva 26, de los cuales cuatro ciclos en forma grupal, agradece por este apoyo a ODEF y ahora a Kiva. 
El grupo se llama Emcograb y está formado por 10 integrantes, pero en esta solicitud solamente se incluyen cinco que en la fotografía se identifican así: al frente esta doña Sandra, al derecha Eustaquio, atrás el de sombrero es Jose Olvi, el de camisa azul rayada es Ramiro y al fondo esta don Jose. Todos viven en la misma comunidad y se dedican  a la agricultura de granos básicos. 
El préstamo grupal suma un total de 106.000 Lempiras y lo utilizaran para compra de insumos, semillas mejoradas de maíz y frijoles y pago de mano de obra. Con el fin de mejorar la producción y su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José, 66, is married and has five children who are all independent now.  He lives in Níspero, Santa Bárbara with his wife, daughter and grandson.  He’s been working in agriculture for forty years growing corn and beans.  He stores his grain in metallic silos while it's waiting to be sold.  His customers are from the local market.  This activity is his source of income.  He dreams with having great basic grain harvests, to be a great farmer and to be able to give his family better quality of life.  José has requested several ODEF loans.  He’s had 26 of them counting the current one; four of them were group loan cycles.  He thanks ODEF for this support and now Kiva too.

The group is called “Emcograb” and it has 10 members but only five of them are included in this loan request.  In the photo they are identified thus: Sandra is in front, Eustaquio is on the right, the one behind wearing the hat is José Olvi’s, Ramiro is wearing the blue striped shirt and José is in the rear.  All of them live in the same community and work in basic grain agriculture.

The group loan sums 106,000 Lempiras and they will use it to buy supplies, enhanced corn and bean seeds and to pay labor costs aiming at improving production and their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies, enhanced corn and bean seeds and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Kumba

texts.en:
Kumba, aged 33, lives together with her friend in Paynesville South. She stopped her education in the 8th grade.

Her friend is a businessman. He gave her the initial capital to start in this business. For the past six years, Kumba has been selling used clothes in the market. She sells both children's clothes and ladies' blouses. Some difficulties she faces are low sales during the rainy season and the competition in the market.

She makes a profit when she sells because of her good interaction with her customers, who flow in every day. She is requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes for the business. Her plan for the future is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes for her business.

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en: Abeer is a mother of two daughters (6 and 3 years old) and a 4-year-old son. Using her first loan, she was able to add wedding dresses to her store for sale and for rental at a reasonable price. She has applied for this youth loan in order to get more wedding accessories such as bridal tiaras, hair accessories, and even special bridal jackets and sleeves in order to sell them at her store.

loans.use: to get more wedding accessories to sell.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es:
La señora Alejandra tiene 46 años de edad, tiene tres hijos. Desde muy joven se ha dedicado a trabajar para ayudar a su numerosa familia, junto con su madre trabajaba en un negocio de elaboración y venta de pupusas. Desde hace 8 años administra ella sola el negocio, y también posee una tienda productos básicos; debido a que su mamá esta muy anciana y Alejandra cuida de ella y de sus hijos. 

Ella viaja a la ciudad que esta a quince minutos en autobús del lugar de donde vive, para comprar los insumos que necesita. Ella sale temprano de su casa para regresar temprano y preparar la venta. El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar productos para su tienda y materia prima para elaborar las pupusas. Con la inversión ella surtirá su negocio y mejorara su local para brindar una mejor atención a sus clientes. Ella desea instalar una granja de cerdos para continuar apoyando a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Alejandra is 46 years old and has three children.  Since she was very young, she has been working to support her large family, and together with her mother, she worked in a shop where they made and sold pupusas (a traditional El Salvadoran snack made from corn dough wrapped around a filling and fried on a flat grill).  For the past 8 years, she has been running the business alone, and she also owns a small grocery store; her mother is very old now and Alejandra takes care of her and her own children.

She travels to the city about 15 minutes by bus from her home to buy the ingredients that she needs.  She leaves very early in the morning from her house so as to return early and prepare her store for business.  The loan she is asking Fundación Campo for is to buy products for her shop and ingredients for making pupusas.  With this investment, she will fill her store and improve her business to give better service to her customers.  She wants to install a pig pen to continue supporting her children.

loans.use: to buy products for her shop and ingredients for making pupusas (stuffed tortillas).

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: La señora Yolanda tiene 44 años, vive con su esposo, tienen 3 hijos que dependen de ellos. Un hijo se encuentra estudiando  en la escuela de la Ciudad de Monteagudo, cursando el nivel secundario, y su otra hija se encuentra estudiando en la universidad de Sucre, y su otro hijo se encuentra  en estado de rehabilitación en Sucre, sufre de parálisis físico. El diario vivir de doña Yolanda es muy preocupante debido a la salud de su hijo que diariamente requiere atención y demanda gastos de dinero y  a veces sus recursos ya no le alcanza. La actividad principal a la que se dedica la señora Yolanda es la elaboración y venta de pan, su esposo tiene una pequeña carpintería donde fabrica puertas que es lo que mas sabe hacer, con el crédito que se le va a otorgar invertirá mas en insumos para la elaboración de pan así aumentando su producción y poder tener mayores ingreso que es lo que mas necesita para mejorar la condición de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Yolanda, 44, lives with her husband; they have three dependent children.  One son attends school in the city of Monteagudo; he’s in secondary school.   Her daughter is attending university in Sucre and her other son is in rehab in Sucre, he has physical paralysis.  

Yolanda’s daily life is worrisome because of her son’s health; he needs daily care and this requires expenditures of money and sometimes her resources are just not enough.  Yolanda’s main activity is baking and selling bread.  Her husband has a small carpentry shop where she manufactures doors which is what he knows best how to make.  

She will use the loan she’ll be granted to buy more ingredients used to make bread to increase production and earn higher income which is what she needs to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy bread-baking supplies.

loans.name: Yasmany

texts.es: El señor Yasmany tiene 30 años de edad él vive en la Población de Chimore de la provincia Carrasco del Municipio de Chimore, de la ciudad de Cochabamba él se encuentra soltero, Yasmany trabaja como chofer. Yasmany vivía en Tarata hace como veinte años atrás él tuvo que venir a Chimore porque no tu ingresos suficientes su padre para poder mantener a su familia, ellos se volvieron a levantar  junto a su madre ya que su padre falleció tomaron un nuevo rumbo en su camino empezaron de cero, ahora él tiene 2 lotes urbanos y una vagoneta noah y de la misma manera él trabaja como chofer.  El préstamo que solicita Yasmany es para la construcción de tinglado y poder ayudar a sus hermanos a tener un techo. Yasmany sueña con un futuro mejor para sus hermanos y que puedan terminar una carrera y asi poder ayudar a las personas de la zona ya que el no pudo terminar una carrera.
texts.en:
Yasmany, 30, lives in Chimore in Carrasco Province in Chimore Municipality in the city of Cochabamba.  He’s single and works as a driver.  Yasmany used to live in Tarata but about 20 years ago had to come to Chimore because his father’s income was insufficient to support the family.  They started to recover again alongside his mother since his father died and they started off on a new path starting from zero.  Now, he owns two urban lots and a Noah van and this is how he works as a driver.

The loan Yasmany is requesting is to build a shed to help his siblings have a roof.  Yasmany dreams with a better future for his siblings and that they are able to complete professional careers to help others in the zone since he was unable to finish a career.

loans.use: to build a shed at home.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah is 48 years old and lives in Airport. She is married and her husband is a teacher. For the past 20 years she has been operating a table in the market where she sells pepper, rice by the cup, onions, salt, and juice. She is requesting a loan to purchase more pepper, rice, onions, salt, and oil for her business. Her plan is to build a house and send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more pepper, rice, onions, salt, and oil for her business.

loans.name: Harriatta

texts.en:
Harriatta is 28 years old and lives in Airport. She is widow with four children; they are between 2 and 11 years old, and all are currently in school and live at home. 

She has been selling rubber dishes and charcoal in the market for the past 7 years; she enjoys the profit she makes in the business. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more rubber dishes (cups, plates, etc) and charcoal for her business. 

Her plans are to build a house and send her children to college in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more rubber dishes (cups, plates, etc) and charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.es: EL SEÑOR TEODORO,  TIENE 48  AÑOS DE EDAD, VIVE EN LA COMUNIDAD DE CAUTA DE LA  PROVINCIA  MIZQUE DEL DEPARTAMENTO DE COCHABAMBA,   TIENE CUATRO  HIJOS DEPENDIENTES, SU ESPOSA ES LA SEÑORA FLORA CON EDAD DE 34 AÑOS QUIEN COLABORA EN LA PRODUCCIÓN AGRÍCOLA LIDERANDO EL MANEJO DEL GANADO VACUNO Y  LA FAMILIA. POR LAS HELADAS FUERTES  REGISTRADAS EN FECHAS DEL 15 AL 25 DE JULIO DEL PRESENTE AÑO EN LA ZONA, DON TEODORO HA PERDIDO GRAN PARTE DE SU PRODUCCIÓN DE ARVEJA Y PAPA EL CUAL HA OCASIONADO UNA DISMINUCIÓN DE INGRESOS ECONÓMICOS, POR VENTA DE ESTOS PRODUCTOS, POR ESTOS MOTIVOS MENCIONADOS LA ESTABILIDAD ECONÓMICA HA SUFRIDO UN DESEQUILIBRIO AFECTANDO DIRECTAMENTE EN LA ADQUISICIÓN DE LOS MATERIALES E INSUMOS REQUERIDOS PARA LA PRODUCCIÓN Y  LA CANASTA FAMILIAR, TAMBIÉN TENÍA PLANIFICADO LA COMPRA DE  2 BUEYES. PARA ENMENDAR LO MENCIONADO ANTERIORMENTE HA RECURRIDO AL CRÉDITO CON EL OBJETIVO DE MEJORAR LA PRODUCCIÓN TRABAJANDO CON TRACCIÓN ANIMAL PARA LO CUAL REQUIERE BUEYES DE BUEN PORTE Y QUE GARANTICE EL TRABAJO DE SIEMBRA Y OTRAS LABORES AGRÍCOLAS.
texts.en:
Teodoro, 48, lives in the community of Cauta, Mizque Province in Cochabamba Department.  He has four dependent children.  His wife is Flora, 34, who helps him with the agricultural work caring for the cattle and the family.

Due to the severe cold registered in the zone between 15 July and 25 July this year, Teodoro has lost a great portion of his pea and potato crops which has led to a drop in income from sale of said products.  Because of this, economic stability has become unbalanced which has directly affected his ability to buy supplies needed for production and for family consumption.  He also plans to buy two oxen.  

To remedy the above situation, he’s called on a loan hoping to improve production working with animal traction he needs strong oxen for that will also guarantee the planting work and other farm chores.

loans.use: to buy oxen.

loans.name: Housein

texts.en:
Housein is from Iraq. He is 56 years old, married and has three children. His wife works and helps with the family income. Housein owns a shop for audio devices. His business is unique because he rents some audio appliances. He established his business in 2003 and now he has an employee. He has accumulated good experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community.

He is requesting a $1800 loan to renovate the shop and install rolling shutters. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better life conditions.

loans.use: to renovate the shop and install rolling shutters.

loans.name: Colores Group

texts.es: Colores es un grupo que lucha por lo que quiere, van en su 3er ciclo. Carmela es una mujer de 36 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 6 y 10 años, ambos estudian y su esposo quedo desempleado después de haber pasado por una enfermedad de su suegro, ya que como no tenia otra hija mas que la señora Carmela y tuvieron que cuidarlo. Ella comenzó vendiendo dulces fuera de su casa desde hace 8 meses, después comenzó a vender paletas de hielo, y luego puso una tienda de abarrotes y todo eso gracias a los créditos. Ahora el crédito la ayudara aponer un puesto para vender pollo asado y comprara una parrilla y comenzara a hacer una estructura para su nuevo negocio. Carmela va paso por paso, quiere poner una placa para su negocio, ya que tiene su negocio en un tejaban y con el tiempo y las lluvias suele mojarse mucho. Este grupo tiene integrantes sobresalientes y muy responsables y que desean salir adelante por sus familias.
texts.en:
"Colores" (Colors) is a group that strives for what it wants; they are in their third cycle.  Carmela, 36, is married and has two children who are 6 and 10 years of age; both attend school.  Her husband became unemployed as a result of his father-in-law’s illness because since he had no daughters other than Carmela they had to take care of him.

She started selling candy outside her house 8 months ago and then started selling frozen pops and then opened a grocery store; all of this was thanks to the loans.  Now the current loan will help her open a stand to sell grilled chicken.  She will buy a grill and start to build a structure for the new business.

Carmela is moving step by step.  She wants to lay a slab for the business because it’s currently in a lean-to and when it rains and the weather is bad it tends to get very wet.

This group has outstanding members who are very responsible and want to get ahead for their families.

loans.use: to buy a grill and to build a structure.

loans.name: Geysell

texts.es: La joven Geysel de 24 años de edad, ha trabajado como asistente voluntario para una institución del gobierno y ahora labora de manera independiente con trabajos temporales, así ir adquiriendo experiencia para enriquecer su curriculum, ella estudia la carrera de ingeniería en telecomunicaciones, gracias a una beca estudiantil sigue hacia adelante con sus estudios, el cual es su gran deseo poderlo culminar, ahora que se encuentra en la etapa final ella solicita apoyo de crédito para pagar el curso de titulación  de su profesión, por tal motivo ella acude a Afodenic y Kiva para lograr su sueño de ser una gran profesional y que sus padres se sientan orgullosa de ella.
texts.en: Geysel is 24 years old.  She has worked as a volunteer assistant for a government institution and now works independently at temporary jobs.  In this way, she is gaining experience to enrich her curriculum.  She is studying for a degree in telecommunications engineering.  Thanks to a scholarship she has been continuing with her studies and she wants to be able to finish her degree.  Now that she is in the final stages, she is requesting support from a loan to pay for her degree granting course. She came to Afodenic and Kiva to achieve her dream of being a professional so that her parents can feel proud of her.

loans.use: to pay for her degree granting course.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: LA SEÑORA MARGARITA, TIENE 58  AÑOS DE EDAD VIVEN EN LA COMUNIDAD DE SAN PEDRO DE LA  PROVINCIA DE MIZQUE DEL DEPARTAMENTO DE COCHABAMBA, YA NO TIENE HIJOS DEPENDIENTES. ESTA ÉPOCA POR EL DESASTRE NATURAL DE LAS FUERTES  HELADAS QUE HUBO EN LA ZONA SU PEQUEÑA PARCELA DE TOMATE Y PAPA NO MADURO BIEN, ESTE DESASTRE LE HIZO FRACASAR EN SUS INGRESOS ECONÓMICOS QUE ELLA ESPERABA. MARGARITA ES UNA PERSONA  MUY QUERIDA Y RESPETADA EN EL LUGAR DONDE VIVE, POR LO DEDICADA A SU TRABAJO QUE A VECES HASTA TIENE QUE TRABAJAR EN JORNAL EN LA AGRICULTURA PARA GANAR ALGUNOS PESOS Y ASÍ MANTENERSE, ELLA ESTÁ SOLICITANDO EL CRÉDITO PARA   COMPRAR SEMILLA DE PAPA, SEMILLA DE CEBOLLA, ABONO ORGÁNICO Y AGROQUÍMICOS PARA SUS CULTIVOS Y ASÍ DE ESTA MANERA  AUMENTAR SU PRODUCCIÓN Y MEJORAR SUS INGRESO ECONÓMICO  EL CRÉDITO AYUDARA MUCHO  A ELLA EN EL DURO TRABAJO QUE REALIZA.
texts.en:
Margarita, 58, lives in the community of San Pedro in Mizque Province, Cochabamba Department.  She no longer has any dependent children.  Because of the recent frost natural disaster in the zone, her small parcel of tomatoes and potatoes did not ripen properly.  This disaster caused her expected family income to fail.

Margarita is a well-loved, respected person where she lives because of her dedication to work.  Sometimes she even has to work as a day laborer to earn a few pesos to support herself.

She’s requesting the loan to buy potato and onion seeds, organic manure and agrochemicals for her crops to increase production and improve her income.  The loan will help her much with the hard work she does.

loans.use: to buy potato and onion seeds, organic manure and agrochemicals.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en: Rebecca lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children, all of whom are in school. She cares for her mother as well. She has run a business selling half bricks for five years. She sells her products on a wholesale basis and she works seven days a week. She applied for a loan of UGX 800,000 to help her buy more half bricks. She generates additional income through a beauty salon. Rebecca faces challenges in seasonality and transportation. Her goals and aspirations are to expand her business by starting more branches and also to own a fully stocked hardware shop, as well as to build her own house. She works with MCDT because services are nearby and suitable for low-income women. Rebecca is renting the house she stays in, and her family has access to electricity and piped water. The greatest monthly expenses for her are school fees and rent.

loans.use: To buy more half bricks

loans.name: Maytham

texts.en:
Maytham is from Iraq. He is 36 years old, married and has two children. He is the only provider for the family. Maytham has a shop for refreshments. He specializes in fresh juices. He established his business in 1991 and now he has an employee. He has accumulated good experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community.

He is requesting a $3000 loan to buy an ice cream machine. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better life conditions.

loans.use: to buy an ice cream machine.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
El señor Carlos esta solicitando nuevamente un crédito con nosotros para poder terminar unos cuartos que empezó a construir con créditos anteriores.
Solicita el crédito para terminar las recamaras que serán para sus tres hijos que tiene ya que son dos niñas y un niño y necesitan su propio espacio y privacidad en la casa.
El señor Carlos es empleado de una tienda de joyería desde hace más de 10 años y su esposa realiza varios trabajos de limpieza en casa particulares en la vecina ciudad de Laredo Texas. Así con los dos ingresos comparten los gastos familiares y escolares.
Planea pagar el crédito con el sueldo que recibe el sr Carlos ya que con el ingreso de su esposa será para los gastos familiares.
Desean que sus hijos pronto tengan ya su propio espacio en la casa y mejorar el patrimonio de la familia.
texts.en:
Carlos is requesting another loan with us so that he can finish building some rooms that he started to build with previous loans.  He is requesting a loan to finish the bedrooms that he's building for his 3 children, because he has 2 girls and a boy, and they need their own space and privacy in the house.

Carlos has been an employee of a jewelry store for more than 10 years, and his wife does a variety of cleaning jobs in private homes in the neighboring city of Laredo, Texas.  With both of these incomes, they share responsibility for the household and educational expenses.

Carlos plans to pay off this loan with the salary he receives from his job, since his wife's income covers the household expenses.  

They hope that soon their children will have their own space in the house, and that they will have an improved property.

loans.use: to finish adding 2 rooms to the second story of their house

loans.name: Vladimeri

texts.en:
Vladimeri is from the Khoni district. He is 44 years old and lives with his parents, wife and two children. His parents are pensioners, and Vladimeri works as a musician to get a monthly salary. Besides his main job, he is involved in an agricultural business. In particular, Vladimeri runs a small dairy farm. He has three dairy cows, whose milk is used for cheese products which are sold at the local open market. In addition, he has a greenhouse where different kinds of vegetables are grown. Vladimeri does all the relevant agricultural work to ensure a good harvest. The family breeds pigs as well and sells piglets seasonally. 

He requested a loan to renovate his house. The existing house is old and damaged. Vladimeri will purchase building materials and repair it. Then, the living conditions of the family will be improved, and they will be able to spend their evenings after hard working days in a more comfortable environment. Vladimeri hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to renovate his house

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is 33 years of age and sells sewing and textile materials in the town of Nakuru. His wife Moureen sells clothes in the marketplace, and they have five children.

This is his second loan term, and he plans to use the amount to buy sewing materials of different varieties to sell to his customers.

He hopes to grow his business so he can open a wholesale business in order to generate more income and be able to provide for the needs of his family.

loans.use: To buy sewing materials.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.es: La Sra. Elisa tiene la edad de 34 años actualmente se encuentra separada con 2 hijos es una mujer muy trabajadora ya que se dedica ala venta de ropa en su hogar con este negocio ya tiene 2 años que se dedica ala venta de ropa lo hace para poder solventar los gastos de ella y de sus 2 hijos ella anteriormente tenia una estética pero la tuvo que cerrar  porque ya no obtenía ganancias por cual motivo decidió ah comenzar con el comercio de la venta de ropa y así generar mas ingresos así como también tendrá mas variedad por lo cual tendrá mas clientes espera contar con la ayuda.
texts.en: Elisa is 34 years old, currently separated, and has two children.  She is a hard-working woman who works selling clothing in her home.  She has had this business for two years.  She started the business to support herself and her children.  She previously had a beauty salon but had to close it because it did not generate enough income.  This made her decide to start selling clothing so that she could earn more income since she would have more variety and be able to assist more customers.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en: Rebecca is 35 years old and lives in Airport. She is married and has six children aged 2 to 21, and she stopped her education at the 2nd grade. Her husband is a businessman. For the past 20 years, she has been selling palm oil, rice, pepper, and okra in the market. She is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil, rice, pepper, and okra for her business. Her plans are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, rice, pepper, and okra for her business.

loans.name: Dúo Abejitas De Santo Tomas Group

texts.es: Abejitas de Santo Tomas así como doña Ana Lucrecia, ella tiene 37 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de ropa de dama caballeros y niños, como pantalones, camisas, playeras, blusas, ropa interior, y calzado por catalogo,  esta actividad la realiza en Santo Tomas Milpas Altas de tipo ambulante, ella tiene 3 niños dos varones y una nena todos estudian en la escuelita local y está solicitando el crédito  para la compra de más mercaderia en ropa en diferentes tamaños y estilos para surtir su negocio y espera que kiva le puede ayudar con el crédito solicitado.
texts.en:
“Abejitas de Santo Tomas” (St. Thomas’ Little Bees)

Ana Lucrecia, 37, sells clothes like pants, shirts, t-shirts, blouses, underwear and shoes via catalogue for women, men and children.  She does this activity from place to place in San Tomas, Milpas Altas.  She has three children, two boys and one girl who all attend the local elementary school.  She’s requesting the loan to buy more clothing merchandise in varied sizes and styles to stock her business and she hopes that Kiva will be able to help her with the requested loan.

loans.use: to buy more clothes in varied sizes and styles.

loans.name: Karem De Los Angeles

texts.es: Karem de 26 años de edad, trabaja como conserje en casa de su hermana, con deseos de superación estudia la carrera de licenciatura en administración de empresas con cinco años de duración el cual ya está en la etapa final de su profesión por lo que ella solicita crédito para poder pagar  el curso de graduación, su salario es muy bajo para ella poder cubrir con este gasto de un solo pago, ya que para ella es muy importante su profesión porque le gusta mucho la administración y con un mejor empleo tendría la oportunidad de ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Karem is 26 years old, and works as a maid in her sister's home. She is presently studying business administration, a program that takes five years to complete. Karem is in her final stage of her studies, and is requesting this loan in order to cover the costs of her final certification and graduation courses. Her current salary is very low, and she cannot afford to cover her study and graduation costs in one payment. 

Karem's studies and career are very important to her, and she hopes that, with a better job as a result of her degree, she will be able to really help and support her family.

loans.use: to pay for her certification and graduation course.

loans.name: Tobias

texts.en:
Tobias, who has a tailoring shop in the town of Nakuru, has used his previous loan to buy clothing materials for his business. It was profitable, and he has been paying the loan amount well and in good time.

This being his second loan term, he plans to buy more stocks of sewing materials to be able to meet the demands of his customers and satisfy their needs.

In the future, Tobias hopes to expand his business by opening another tailoring shop in the area.

loans.use: purchase clothing materials.

loans.name: Maria Coralia

texts.es: Doña Maria Coralia es una señora de 48 años y tiene una tienda de productos comestibles de primera cecesidad ubicada en su casa desde hace 28 años, además de su tienda ella vende cosméticos y refacciones los fines de semana en el mercado de San Raymundo, y nos cuenta que está solicitando este crédito para poder surtir su tienda, para la compra de productos comestibles y comprar algunas frutas navideñas ya que se aproxima la época en la que ella año tras año vende ese producto, y, las personas ya la conocen, ahora no es la excepción, entonces quiere el capital para invertirlo, ya que de su trabajo y esfuerzo a podido sacar adelante a sus hijas ya que ha tenido momentos difíciles porque su esposo ha estado muy enfermo entonces no ha podido trabajar bien y lo que gana a veces solo lo utilizan para la medicina ya que está en tratamiento por su enfermedad, entonces espera que fape pueda apoyarla para seguir luchando por su familia y especialmente sus hijas que están estudiando y necesitan muchas cosas.
texts.en: Doña Coralia is a woman of 48, she has had a grocery store where she sells basic products, located in the house where she lives, for 28 years. In addition to her store, she sells cosmetics and snacks on the weekends in the market in San Raymundo.. She tells us that she is applying for this loan to be able to stock her store by buying grocery products and some Christmas fruits, since the season is coming in which she sells this product year after year, and people already know about it, so she doesn't want this year to be an exception. Now she needs capital to invest. With her work and effort she has been able to raise her daughters, but she has had difficult moments because her husband has been very sick and so hasn't been able to work well, and what he earns at times they can only use for medicine, since he is in treatment for his illness. Now she hopes that FAPE can help her continue striving for her family and especially for her daughters, who are in school and need many things.

loans.use: to buy food products to sell.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en: Josephine is 28 years old and a single parent. She lives in Paynesville South with a 2-year-old child who attends school. She has been involved in her business for the past two years. She received a loan from BRAC Liberia to start her business, where she sells rice, pepper, onions, salt, tomatoes, cooking oil, palm oil, and many other items. She makes a profit when she sells items, and with the profit she buys more goods and attends to her child. She is proud of her business because she is self-reliant. She has requested a loan to purchase more pepper, onions, rice, salt, and cooking oil for her business. Her plan for the future is to buy land and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more pepper, onions, rice, salt, and cooking oil for her business.

loans.name: Hillary

texts.en:
Hillary is 41 years old, married to Lillian, and blessed with four children aged 11, nine, seven and four years respectively. 

He operates a hotel business that he started a year ago and earns a monthly income of KES 75,000. He wants to purchase 10 litres of cooking oil, five bales of baking flour, sugar, rice and potatoes and has requested for a first loan of KES 15,000. 

The profit he makes from his business will help him open up a shop. Hillary's dream is to prosper in the business world.

loans.use: to purchase 10 litres of cooking oil, five bales of baking flour, sugar, rice and potatoes.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de lacteos,la socia vende quesos,leche y mantequillas,ella trabaja en una empresa desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 6 años en este negocio y el va muy bien,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es tener su propio local donde pueda vender los lacteos.La socia solicita el credito para comprar un equipo de soinido para su casa.
La socia esta feliz con el credito y se compromete a pagar las cuotas de su casa.
texts.en:
Julia continues her work at her dairy sales business, where she sells products such as cheeses, milk and butter. She has six years of experience in this trade, and works from 8:00 in the morning until 5:00 in the afternoon. Business is going well, and Julia hopes to continue that positive trend and to grow and strengthen her business. 

Her dream is to eventually open her own dairy shop, and she is requesting this loan in order to purchase a sound system for her home. Julia is grateful for this opportunity, and promises to make prompt loan repayments.

loans.use: to purchase a sound system for her home.

loans.name: Joweria

texts.en: Joweria lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with two children, and both of her children are in school. She also takes care of one additional family member, her young brother. Joweria runs a business of selling secondhand clothes at the market. She has been in this business for four years. She works six days a week. She also does some tailoring for another source of income. She applied for a loan of 600,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT SACCO to buy more clothes for sale. The main challenges in her business are bad debtors and thieves. Her goals and aspirations are to buy land and build her own house, and also to become a wholesaler. She decided to work with MCDT because MCDT serves women with low incomes like her. Joweria is renting the house in which she stays. She has access to electricity; however, she has no access to piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees, rent and food.

loans.use: To buy more used clothes

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
Marco Antonio: es natural de la ciudad del Cusco y el pertenece al banco comunal, Chaska ñahui, ubicado en la ciudad del Cusco.El socio es casado y tiene 3 hijos.El socio es contador de profesión, el socio trabaja llevando la contabilidad de una empresa privada. El socio solicita el préstamo para uso personal para comprar una computadora. 

Nuestro socio valora y agradece el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Marco Antonio is a native of Cusco, and is a member of the community bank Chaska ñahui, which is located in the city of Cusco. Marco Antonio is married and has three children, and is an accountant. He works keeping the books as an accountant for a private business. He is requesting this loan in order to purchase a computer for personal use.

Marco Antonio is grateful for this opportunity, and promises to make prompt loan repayments.

loans.use: to purchase a computer for personal use.

loans.name: Intihuatana Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “INTIHUATANA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Marleni ella es soltera y tiene 37 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de crianza de animales como gallinas,chanchos y cuyes,la socia los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en el mercado o en las diferentes ferias,la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio anteriormente la socia se dedicaba al negocio de venta de verduras pero no le fue muy bien y decidió de cambiarse de negocio,la socia por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cuyes,chanchos y gallinas y también para comprar alimentos para los animales.
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de verduras, negocio de venta de maiz, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de animales.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The group members pictured above belong to the community bank, "INTIHUATANA," which is located in the Urcos district in the Quispicanchis province, department of Cusco.

Marleni is a member of the group, is 37 years old, and has two children. She makes a living raising and breeding animals such as chickens, pigs and guinea pigs, and she feeds them to fatten them up for sale in the local markets and fairs. Marleni has five years of experience in this trade, and she previously worked selling vegetables, but that endeavor did not go as she had hoped. She therefore decided to change businesses in an effort to provide for her children, and her dream is to eventually open her own store for selling her animals. Marleni is requesting this loan in order to purchase animals for her business, such as guinea pigs, pigs and chickens, and to buy feed for her animals as well.

The other group members work in various trades, including: vegetable sales, corn sales, operating grocery and general stores, and animal sales.

Marleni is grateful for this opportunity and for the lenders who make her dream possible, and she promises to make prompt loan repayments

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs, pigs, chickens, as well as animal feed.

loans.name: Hashem

texts.en:
Hashem is from Iraq. He is 47 years old and married, and has three children. He is the only provider for the family. Hashem owns a small grocery store selling soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents and snacks. He established his business in 2011 and now he has an employee. He has accumulated good experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community.

He is requesting a $3000 loan to renovate the shop and increase his inventory. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better life conditions.

loans.use: to renovate his shop and increase his inventory.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: María Aurentina

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 65 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen ocho hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad pero dos de ellos aun vive con ella. Su esposo es agricultor.

Doña María para ayudar a solventar los gastos del hogar se dedica al comercio, tiene una pequeña tienda en su casa, allí vende todo tipo de víveres, legumbres, verduras y frutas,  además de ciertas cosas de bazar y papelería, trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, sus hijos le ayuda en su trabajo cuando ellos pueden, lleva más de 8 años con su negocio y  está muy contenta ya que allí se siente útil realizando una actividad que le deja muy buenos beneficios sin salir de su casa.
 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en la compra de víveres para surtir más su tienda. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio hace más de 7  años y le gusta porque con los créditos ha podido mejorar su negocio y su situación económica.
 
Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca.
texts.en:
In the canton of Rocafuerte the members of the communal bank Mujeres Organizadas meet twice a month. This place is known for its delicious sweets that the local people prepare and they are known throughout the country.

María lives here. She is 65 years old, married and has eight children from this relationship, all adults but two of them still live with her. Her husband is a farmer.

María works in commerce in order to help pay the household expenses. She has a little store in her home, selling all types of food, garden produce, vegetables and fruits, plus some bazaar and stationery items. She works every day from 6:00AM until 8:00PM and sometimes later. Her children help with the work when they can. She has had the business more than eight years and she is very happy there and feels useful in this activity that gives her good earnings without leaving her home.

This loan will be used to buy provisions to supply her store. She has been with the communal bank since it began more than seven years ago and she likes it because with the loans she has been able to improve her business and her economic situation.

Her goals are to continue getting ahead in her business and expanding her store.

loans.use: to buy provisions to supply her home based grocery store.

loans.name: Souleman

texts.fr: Souleman est une homme de 35 ans marié, père de 4 enfants . Il detient une boutique dans un coin de la place où il vend des épices et autres divers produits depuis 15 ans. Grace à son dynamisme et sa compétence dans ce domaine il s'est fait une clientèle grandissante qu'il n'arrive plusn à satisfaire. Ceci est dü à la petitesse de son capital. Pour cela Il sollicite un crédit qui lui permettra d'augmenter son stock des épices( poivre blanc, noir, piment en sachet, épices poulet, poisson, porc...)Les bénéfices tirés de ce prêt seront réinvestis en partie dans son activité pour l'agrandir, le reste l'aidera à subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Souleman is a 35-year-old man, married, and the father of four children.  He runs a shop in his locality and he has been selling spices and various other goods for the past fifteen years.

Thanks to his enthusiasm and his good experience in this field, he has managed to attract an increasing number of customers.  However, he is currently having a hard time meeting all of his customers' needs, because his capital is very small.

For this reason, Souleman is requesting a loan which will allow him to increase his stock of spices (white and black pepper, sachets of pimento, chicken, fish and pork seasonings...)

The profits from this loan will be reinvested, in part, into expanding his business, while the rest will be used to meet the needs of his family.

loans.use: to increase his stock of spices (white and black pepper, sachets of pimento, chicken, fish and pork seasonings...)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Domitila

texts.es: Domitila, de 48 años, es una mujer buena y alegre, es conviviente con su pareja con quien es madre de tres hijos, de 31, 27 y 25 años. Juntos habitan en su casa propia y ahí disfruta dar lo mejor de si por el bien de su familia. El trabajo de Domitila, consiste en la venta de frutas regionales, que lo realiza durante el día, ella sale a la vereda de su casa y ahí exhibe las deliciosas frutas seleccionadas por ella misma cuando son comprados en el mercado mayorista regional. Por las noches vende comida regional, sale a partir de las 5 de la tarde y empieza a preparar sus potajes entre lo que ofrece a sus comensales tenemos la patarahsca, pollo a la parrilla, chorizo ahumado, tacacho, juanes, etc. Lleva 10 años realizando este trabajo el cual lo hace sola. Ahora quiere implementar sus actividades con la venta de golosinas ya que le solicitan sus clientes. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le da el espacio suficiente para tener dos ingresos en su hogar, además la cocina siempre fue su pasión y le gusta desde muy pequeña. Espera en adelante ampliar su negocio y vender golosinas. Este es el préstamo número 13 con la institución MFP, siempre se caracterizó dentro de su grupo como una persona responsable, está feliz por la oportunidad que le brindan para poder realizar una buena inversión, además está segura de que seguirá cancelando sus cuotas a tiempo como lo hizo hasta ahora.Con el monto solicitado 2500 soles, comprará frutas de temporada para venderlos entre sus clientes, además comprará insumos con los que prepara los alimentos que vende.
texts.en:
Domitila is 48 years old, and is a happy, good woman who lives with her life partner and their three children, ages 31, 27 and 25. Their family lives in their own house, and Domitila enjoys sharing life with and working to provide for her family. Domitila makes a living selling regional fruits during the daytime from a stand on the sidewalk outside her home. She proudly displays and sells the fruit she selects by hand from the best local market. After 5:00 in the evening, Domitila begins her work cooking and selling traditional, regional food dishes, such as: patarashca (a traditional seafood dish), grilled chicken, smoked sausage, tacacho (a grilled meat and plantain dish), etc. She has 10 years of experience in her trades, and largely works alone. Since her customers have been asking, Domitila wants to expand her business to include selling candy.

Domitila is grateful that her jobs allow her to generate income for covering household expenses. In addition, cooking has always been one of her passions from a very young age. She hopes to expand and strengthen her businesses, and to begin selling candy and sweets soon. This is her 13th loan with MFP, and she has always been known at her community bank as a responsible and dependable person. 

Domitila is grateful for this opportunity, and promises to continue her good track record of prompt loan repayments. With the support from this loan, she plans to buy seasonal fruits for resale at her stand, as well as the food ingredients necessary for cooking up her delicious dishes.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal fruits for resale at her stand, as well as ingredients for cooking various food dishes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Martha Valentina

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar vive a la señora Martha, tiene 27 años de edad mantiene una relación de unión libre de la tiene  tres hijos de 11, 5 y 3 años de edad, los dos mayores estudian en escuela. Su marido ameniza fiestas pues tiene un disco móvil.

Doña Martha es una muy buena ama de casa que para ayudar a su esposo realiza el crédito para que él lo utilice en su trabajo, él tiene un disco móvil  que por lo general dos tres veces por semana tiene fiestas o eventos donde  ameniza estas reuniones con la música y juegos de luces que tiene su disco móvil, él lleva más de 5 años con este trabajo y es así como saca adelante a su familia. 

Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar un amplificador que necesita y así brindar un mejor servicio. Lleva cinco ciclos  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque con los créditos ha podido ayudar en algo a su marido.
 
Su sueño es tener su casa propia pues arriendan donde viven.
texts.en:
In the canton of Rocafuerte, the members of the communal bank Mujeres organizadas (Organized Women) meet together every 15 days. This place is known for its delicious sweets prepared by the locals and recognized by the whole country. 

Martha lives in that place. She is 27 years old, and has three children, 11, 5, and 3 years old, together with her husband. The two oldest attend school. 

Her husband entertains at parties with his portable DJ equipment. 

Martha is a good housewife; in order to help her husband, she requests a loan so that he can use it for his work. He has DJ equipment that he uses generally two or three times a week at parties and events to provide music and light shows. He has more than 5 years of experience in this field, and it is why he has been able to move his family forward. 

This loan will be used to buy an amplifier needed to improve upon his service. 

Martha has been through 5 cycles of the communal bank, and she likes it because it has allowed her to help her husband. 

Her dream is to have her own house because they currently leasing where they live.

loans.use: to buy an amplifier.

loans.name: Togan

texts.en: Togan is 32 years old, lives in Airport, and has five children aged 2 to 17. For the past 12 years Togan has been operating a restaurant, a business she especially enjoys because of her relationship with her customers, She is requesting a loan to purchase more pepper, rice, onion, salt, vita, fish, and bush meat for her enterprise. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more pepper, rice, onion, salt, vita, fish, and bush meat for her business.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy has a grocery business in Nakuru town, and the business has been profitable, enabling her to provide for the needs of her family. She is 36 years old and a single mother of four schooling children.

This is her second loan, and she plans to use the loan amount to buy vegetables, such as cabbages, spinach and kale, to resell. She also plans to buy more stock of fruits, which include bananas, oranges, mangoes and watermelons. Part of the amount will also be used to buy milk to resell.

Lucy hopes to grow her business and open a bigger grocery store in town, to make more income and to be able to provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruits and milk to resell in her grocery business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Francisca Narcisa

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar vive la señora Francisca, tiene 42 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual no ha podido tener hijos. Su marido es chofer.

Doña Francisca con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos que genera el hogar se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo, sabanas y productos de Yanbal y Esika (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, de tres a cuatro  días a la semana sale a recorrer con sus productos los mismos que deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 días, la mercadería la va a comprar cada quince días a Guayaquil o cuando  necesita. Lleva  15 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y productos de Esika. Lleva más de 1 año en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque con el primer crédito emprendió su negocio.
 
Su sueño es tener un carro para realizar sus recorridos.
texts.en:
In the canton of Rocafuerte the members of the communal bank Mujeres Organizadas meet twice a month. This place is known for the delicious sweets that the local people prepare and they are known throughout the country.

Francisca lives here. She is 42 years old, has a common-law relationship and has not been able to have children. Her husband is a driver. 

Francisca, with the intention of earning something on her own in order to help her husband with the household expenses, works  in commerce, selling all types of clothing, bed linens, and Yanbal and Esika products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and accessories for ladies.)

She sells door-to-door, three to four days a week, leaving her products on credit and then collecting every eight days. She buys the merchandise in Guayaquil twice a month or when she needs to. She has been doing this work for fifteen years and it’s going well.

This loan will be used to buy more merchandise such as: pants, blouses, t-shirts, and Esike products. She has been more than a year with the communal bank and she likes it because with the first loan she started her business.

Her dream is to have a car for her journeys.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, t-shirts, and Esika products to sell in her door-to-door business

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is from Iraq. He is 38 years old, married and has five children. He is the only provider for the family.

Ali is a blacksmith. He started working in this field with his father, and after having a good experience he established his own business in 2010. He has an employee now, and a good reputation in his local community.

He is requesting a $3000 loan to buy two machines for his business. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so he will be able to provide his family with better life conditions.

loans.use: to buy two machines for his business.

loans.name: Digna Viviana

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar vive la señora Viviana, tiene 32 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual ha procreado tres hijos de 13, 6  y 3 años de edad, los mayores  estudian en colegio y  escuela. Su marido es profesor de un colegio de la ciudad.
 
Doña Viviana para ganar algo por su cuenta y con el fin de lograr un futuro mejor para su familia, hace siete años empezó con su negocio de imprenta y papelería y después aumento el servicio de trabajos en computadoras, en su negocio también vende útiles escolares, libros y otros materiales que los estudiantes utilizan para su aprendizaje, trabaja de lunes a sábado desde las 6h30 hasta las 21h00,  le ayudan su mamá, su hermano y su esposo cuando este está desocupado, también realizan trabajos de mantenimiento de computadoras en su localidad.
 
Este crédito es para comprar más útiles escolares, papel, tinta entre otras cosas. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio, es la tesorera del banco y le gusta porque los créditos son de gran ayuda en su negocio.
 
Sus sueños son seguir adelante con su negocio y darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The village bank Mujeres Organizadas meets every 15 days in the canton of Rocafuerte, a place known throughout the country for delicious locally-made sweets.

Here we meet Viviana, 32, who is married and has three children, ages 13, 6 and 3. The oldest are in high school and elementary school. Her husband is a teacher at a local high school. 

In order to make her own money and give her family a better future, Viviana started a business seven years ago offering printing services and paper goods. She later added computer work as well. In her store she sells school supplies, books and other learning materials for students. She works Monday to Saturday from 6:30am to 9pm. Her mother, brother and husband help her when they're free, and she also does computer maintenance. 

This loan is to buy more school supplies, paper, ink and other things. She has been a part of the village bank since the beginning. She is the treasurer and likes it because the loans really help out her business. Her dreams are to continue making progress with her business and to give her children the very best.

loans.use: to buy school supplies, paper, ink, etc.

loans.name: Blanca Filerma

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar vive la señora Blanca, tiene  63 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tiene 5 hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad pero la menor  aun viven con ella. Su esposo es agricultor.

Doña Blanca es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos se dedica a la venta de ropa por catálogos y productos de Avon y Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, trabaja tres días de la semana, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada semana, lo que más vende son los perfumes que son de muy buena calidad y son muy apreciados por sus clientes. Tiene más de cuatro  años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y ropa. Es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque los intereses son más bajos que en otras instituciones de crédito.

Su sueño es seguir adelante con su negocio.
texts.en:
The village bank Mujeres Organizadas meets every 15 days in the canton of Rocafuerte, a place known throughout the country for delicious locally-made sweets. 

Blanca, 63, lives here. She is married and has 5 children who are all grown, though the youngest daughter still lives with her. Her husband is a farmer. 

Blanca is a housewife who decided to sell clothing and Avon and Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and ladies' accessories) from catalogs in order to make her own money. She sells door to door, working three days a week. She sells on credit and collects payment weekly. Her most-sold product are the perfumes which are very good quality and much appreciated by her customers. She has been doing this for over 4 years and it's going very well.

This loan is to buy perfumes, lotions, cosmetics and clothing. She is a founding member of the bank and likes it because the interest rates are lower than in other lending institutions. Her dream is to continue moving forward with her business.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, lotions, cosmetics and clothing.

loans.name: Ana

texts.en: Ana is 22 years old, single, and lives in Airport. She has two children, aged 1 and 3 years. Both of them live at home, and one is currently in school. For the past 12 years, Ana has been selling bread around her community. She enjoys the profit she makes in the business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more bread for her business. Her plans are to build her house and send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of bread to resell.

loans.name: Najem

texts.en:
Najem is from Iraq. He is 62 years old, married and has two children. He is the only provider for the family.

Najem owns a small grocery store selling soft drinks, juices, dairy products, detergents and snacks, among other things. He established his business in 2006. He has a good experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community.

He is requesting a $750 loan to paint the shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so he will be able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to paint the shop.

loans.name: Eldith

texts.es: Eldith, de 52 años, es una mujer buena y muy responsable, ella crió y educó a sus 3 hijos siendo madre soltera, ahora tiene a sus hijos mayores y son independientes. Juntos viven en su casa propia. El trabajo de Eldith consiste en la venta de ropa y cosméticos por catálogo, siendo las colonias y perfumes lo que mas vende. Su trabajo lo realiza todos los días, en busca de sus amigos, vecinos y familiares para vender algún producto o entregar aquellos que ya han sido solicitados con anticipación. Lleva realizando este trabajo por 10 años aproximadamente y lo hace sola ya que ella ahora sola solventa los gastos de sus hijos. Por otro lado, vende comida los fines de semana en un parque deportivo y eso le permite tener una clientela fluida durante esos días. Le esta yendo bien, ya que no genera muchos gastos y lo que vende le alcanza para pagar los gastos básicos que requiere, pero mas adelante desea empezar con la venta de prendas de vestir para asi aprovechar la temporada navideña. Este es el préstamo número 6 con la institución MFP, es por ello que agradece a todas las personas que le brindan la oportunidad de acceder a un crédito financiero para que pueda concretar sus planes. Con el monto solicitado de 3000 comprará más productos para tener en stock como perfumes, talcos y cremas corporales, además comprará ropa para empezar la venta a sus clientes en la temporada navideña.
texts.en:
Eldith, 52, is a good, responsible woman. She raised and educated her three children as a single mother. Now they are grown and independent, and they live together in the house she owns. Eldith's work is selling clothing and cosmetics from catalogs - colognes and perfumes are her best sellers. She works every day, looking for friends, neighbors and family members to sell products to or deliver those that have been ordered ahead of time. She has been doing this for around 10 years, working alone since she is the only one covering the costs for her household. In addition, she sells food on the weekends at the sports park, which allows her to have a flow of customers on those days. It's going well because she doesn't have a lot of expenses and she sells enough to pay for her basic needs. In the future she would like to start selling clothing to take advantage of the Christmas season. 

This is her 6th loan with the institution MFP, and she thanks everyone who has given her the opportunity to access a loan so that she could make her plans a reality. With the 3000 soles requested she will buy more products to have in stock like perfumes, powders and body lotions. She will also buy clothing to begin selling to her customers during the holiday season.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, powders and body lotions as well as clothing.

loans.name: María Auxiliadora

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mujeres Organizadas. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 61 años de edad, está casada y tuvo 10 hijos los cuales son mayores de edad y dos de ellos viven con ella. Su marido es agricultor.
 
Doña María se dedica a la producción y comercialización de dulces, todas las mañanas se levanta a las 5h00 a preparar los dulces los mismos que realiza con mucha paciencia y cariño, una vez preparados sus deliciosos dulces los entrega a comerciantes que los llevan a vender a otros cantones y ciudades del país, en esta labor le ayuda uno de sus hijos.
